name: Trapped (itch) (Slimera)
description:
Allie wakes up in a mysterious dungeon and has to try and escape without getting killed by the will of the dungeon. 

Its my very first game made using rpg maker.

I was inspired to make the game from two amazing games made by someone else on this website, the two games are called 'Arias Story' and 'Midnight Train' they are absolutely amazing games with great stories!

Its a pretty short game...

maybe around 10-20 minutes of gameplay maybe a bit more if you interact with everything in the game.

there is only one ending but several ways to die which I think were pretty creative if you ask me!

Arrow keys to move, Z to interact and X for inventory which is basically useless except for saving if you dont want to completely restart the game if you die...

Enjoy!

Edit: Fixed some mistakes in the game...
